abstract: The officials supervising the wind-down of MF Global’s remains said on Saturday that they had reached a broad settlement over claims among the entities they oversee.
snippet: The officials supervising the wind-down of MF Global’s remains said on Saturday that they had reached a broad settlement over claims among the entities they oversee.

headline.main: MF Global Overseers Reach Accord Over Claims
headline.print_headline: MF Global Officials Reach Accord Over Claims

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
